name: SETUP-OP-00002
details: Tag instrument, verify customer notes, confirm play state. Protect finish and posts; install key clamps as needed.
work_instructions: Gloves on. Bench mat in place. Photograph current condition. Note missing/loose parts. Verify serial.
safety_notes: Eye protection during compressed air and solvents.
qc_target: All keys move freely; no immediate binding or loose posts.

name: SETUP-OP-00003
details: Baseline leak-light and suction check to guide work.
work_instructions: Leak-light pass tone-hole by tone-hole; annotate leaks. Gentle suction test per stack.
qc_target: Document baseline leaks; proceed to correction steps.

name: SETUP-OP-00004
details: Inspect cork integrity, fit, and alignment. Correct high spots; ensure airtight fit.
work_instructions: Blue/graphite transfer for high-spot mapping; dress lightly. Confirm smooth rotation and full seat.
safety_notes: Cut away from hand; dust control for cork.
qc_target: Airtight at joint; smooth on/off; zero wobble.
qc_tolerance: No detectable leak with suction/light test.

name: SETUP-OP-00005
details: Same as above; verify bridge alignment and key interaction.
work_instructions: Fit cork, check axial play; verify bridge keys clear and align.
safety_notes: Mind bridge key tips during assembly.
qc_target: Airtight; smooth seat; precise bridge alignment.

name: SETUP-OP-00006
details: Fit and seal bell tenon cork; confirm bell resonance not damped by over-tight fit.
work_instructions: Size cork, light dress, confirm seat depth.
qc_target: Free bell resonance; no buzz; airtight.

name: SETUP-OP-00007
details: Inspect rims for chips, divots, raised grain; correct.
work_instructions: Dust+adhesive micro-fill as needed; burnish; re-true rim; verify flat with straightedge/dye.
qc_target: Uniform pad print; no light at full close.

name: SETUP-OP-00008
details: Same inspection/correction for lower joint.
work_instructions: As above; pay special attention to long B/F, E♭ holes.
qc_target: Uniform pad print; no light.

name: SETUP-OP-00009
details: Minimal corrective ream to remove varnish/ridge and restore true rim; avoid diameter drift.
work_instructions: Use correctly sized pilot/reamer; 1–2 light passes; re-check pad contact.
safety_notes: Stop if diameter change measurably affects pitch.
qc_target: Rim true; original vent maintained.
qc_tolerance: No >0.1 mm change in effective vent.

name: SETUP-OP-00010
details: Detect & seal micro-leaks at chimney interface; re-dress rim.
work_instructions: Dye test; wick thin sealant; cure; re-true rim lightly; re-check with light/suction.
qc_target: No leak at chimney after cure.

name: SETUP-OP-00011
details: True cups, float/seat pads, set pad angles for full seal.
work_instructions: Check cup plane; shim/float; heat-seat evenly; verify uniform impression.
safety_notes: Heat control to avoid pad damage.
qc_target: No light; negative pressure hold ≥3 s per close.

name: SETUP-OP-00012
details: As above for lower joint pads including linked closures.
work_instructions: Float and seat; coordinate linked key closures (e.g., long B/F).
qc_target: No light; negative pressure hold ≥3 s.

name: SETUP-OP-00013
details: Set vent heights for balance of response/intonation; verify twelfths.
work_instructions: Set travel stops; measure with feeler gauges; play-check open G–A–B♭ and twelfths.
qc_target: Even venting; typical 0.9–1.1 mm for throat group (model dependent).
qc_tolerance: ±0.1 mm within group; twelfths within ±5 cents.

name: SETUP-OP-00014
details: Set stack heights and linked closures for evenness and stable twelfths.
work_instructions: Balance heights across RH stack; confirm long B/F linkage does not over-vent.
qc_target: Even venting across RH stack for smooth scale.
qc_tolerance: ±0.1 mm within group; twelfths within ±5 cents.

name: SETUP-OP-00015
details: Balance return force for speed with minimal finger load.
work_instructions: Measure with gram gauge; match neighboring keys; remove coil stress points.
qc_target: Uniform feel; typical LH stack ~30–45 gf.

name: SETUP-OP-00016
details: Balance long key return vs link friction; ensure positive close.
work_instructions: Gauge and match; ensure linked closures do not lag.
qc_target: Uniform feel; typical RH stack/long keys ~35–55 gf.

name: SETUP-OP-00017
details: Replace register cork with beveled geometry for silent closure and stable vent.
work_instructions: Select proper density; cut bevel for glide; cement, cure, final dress to spec height.
qc_target: Register pad gap/vent per model spec; silent actuation.
qc_tolerance: No audible thump; gap repeats within ±0.1 mm.

name: SETUP-OP-00018
details: Re-verify pad impressions after height/spring/cork changes.
work_instructions: Leak-light + suction; correct micro leaks.
qc_target: Zero light on all upper pads.

name: SETUP-OP-00019
details: Same verification for lower joint.
work_instructions: Leak-light + suction; correct micro leaks.
qc_target: Zero light on all lower pads.

name: SETUP-OP-00020
details: Oil pivots/rods, treat felts/corks, eliminate clicks.
work_instructions: Tiny oil on bearings only; wipe excess; confirm silence.
qc_target: Silent action; free return.
qc_tolerance: No audible mechanical noise at mezzo-forte fingerings.

name: SETUP-OP-00021
details: Full assembled leak test to confirm global seal.
work_instructions: Leak-light sweep; suction per stack; correct any regression.
qc_target: Zero light across instrument; stable holds.
qc_tolerance: Holds negative pressure ≥3 s per group.

name: SETUP-OP-00022
details: Confirm A4 reference and twelfths; micro-adjust heights if needed.
work_instructions: Tune at A=440/442 per shop standard; check twelfths and throat notes for balance.
safety_notes: Hearing protection if using sustained tones.
qc_target: A4 within ±5 cents at target pitch; twelfths balanced.

name: SETUP-OP-00023
details: Full scale, articulation, interval slurs; document QC.
work_instructions: Slow/fast scales, pp–ff, side-key trills; document results and any advisories.
qc_target: Even response and clean articulation across range.
qc_tolerance: No sticking; no mechanical noise; stable scale.
